outputs.output_descr:
Project Objective: The effectiveness and efficiency of Sustainable Land Management initiatives in Cuba is maximized programme-wide. 
Outcome 1. Institutions coordinate their Sustainable Land Management initiatives effectively programme-wide.
Outcome 2. Sustainable Land Management initiatives in Cuba respond to the results of monitoring and evaluation of programme-wide conditions. 
Outcome 3. Monitoring, learning, adaptive feedback & evaluation.

project_descr: CUBA: COORDINATION, MONITORING AND EVALUATION OF CUBA COUNTRY PILOT PARTNERSHIP ON SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT.
project_title: CUBA: MONITORING SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT PROGRAMME
